name: Akroma's Devoted
text: Cleric creatures have vigilance.
flavor: Akroma asked for only one thing from her troops: unwavering, unconditional loyalty.
title: Akroma's Devoted

name: Akroma, Angel of Wrath
text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, trample, haste, protection from black and from red
flavor: "No rest. No mercy. No matter what."
title: Akroma, Angel of Wrath

name: Aphetto Exterminator
text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Aphetto Exterminator is turned face up, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
title: Aphetto Exterminator

name: Aven Envoy
text: Flying
flavor: Their grieving faces tell far more than a list of casualties ever could.
title: Aven Envoy

name: Aven Redeemer
text:
Flying
{T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
flavor: Redeemers rise with the sun, and the spirits of the people rise with them.
title: Aven Redeemer

name: Aven Warhawk
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Bird and/or Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying
title: Aven Warhawk

name: Bane of the Living
text:
Morph {X}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bane of the Living is turned face up, all creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.
title: Bane of the Living

name: Beacon of Destiny
text: {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to Beacon of Destiny instead.
flavor: "We all borrowed life from the Ancestor to exist in this world. Today, I repay that debt."
title: Beacon of Destiny

name: Berserk Murlodont
text: Whenever a Beast becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it.
flavor:
"The harder we press forward, the harder Krosa pushes us back."
—Aven scout
title: Berserk Murlodont

name: Blade Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +1/+0.
flavor: After breaking free from the Riptide Project, the slivers quickly adapted to life on Otaria—much to the dismay of life on Otaria.
title: Blade Sliver

name: Blood Celebrant
text: {B}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
flavor:
"Their blood is the nectar that nourishes the Cabal."
—Phage the Untouchable
title: Blood Celebrant

name: Bloodstoke Howler
text:
Morph {6}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Bloodstoke Howler is turned face up, Beast creatures you control get +3/+0 until end of turn.
title: Bloodstoke Howler

name: Branchsnap Lorian
text:
Trample
Morph {G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: Lorians treat trees and prey the same way: by ripping them limb from limb.
title: Branchsnap Lorian

name: Brontotherium
text:
Trample
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Lucky victims get run over. Unlucky victims get run through.
title: Brontotherium

name: Brood Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may put a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: Within weeks, more slivers nested in Otaria than ever existed on Rath.
title: Brood Sliver

name: Caller of the Claw
text:
Flash
When Caller of the Claw enters the battlefield, put a 2/2 green Bear creature token onto the battlefield for each nontoken creature put into your graveyard from the battlefield this turn.
title: Caller of the Claw

name: Canopy Crawler
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter on Canopy Crawler.
title: Canopy Crawler

name: Celestial Gatekeeper
text:
Flying
When Celestial Gatekeeper dies, exile it, then return up to two target Bird and/or Cleric permanent cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
title: Celestial Gatekeeper

name: Cephalid Pathmage
text:
Cephalid Pathmage can't be blocked.
{T}, Sacrifice Cephalid Pathmage: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor: Pathmages can open doors that aren't even there.
title: Cephalid Pathmage

name: Chromeshell Crab
text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Chromeshell Crab is turned face up, you may exchange control of target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls.
title: Chromeshell Crab

name: Clickslither
text:
Haste
Sacrifice a Goblin: Clickslither gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.
flavor: The least popular goblins get the outer caves.
title: Clickslither

name: Cloudreach Cavalry
text: As long as you control a Bird, Cloudreach Cavalry gets +2/+2 and has flying.
flavor: "It's easy to lose sight of hope until you gaze out from my vantage point."
title: Cloudreach Cavalry

name: Corpse Harvester
text: {1}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a Zombie card and a Swamp card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
title: Corpse Harvester

name: Covert Operative
text: Covert Operative can't be blocked.
flavor: Some spies seek clarity. Others seek transparency.
title: Covert Operative

name: Crested Craghorn
text:
Haste
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor:
"Craghorns experience a wide range of emotions: rage, fury, anger . . ."
—Foothill guide
title: Crested Craghorn

name: Crookclaw Elder
text:
Flying
Tap two untapped Birds you control: Draw a card.
Tap two untapped Wizards you control: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
title: Crookclaw Elder

name: Crypt Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Regenerate target Sliver."
flavor:
"Death couldn't contain the slivers. What made us think we could?"
—Riptide Project researcher
title: Crypt Sliver

name: Dark Supplicant
text: {T}, Sacrifice three Clerics: Search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for a card named Scion of Darkness and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavor: Cabal clerics serve two masters: their patriarch and their god.
title: Dark Supplicant

name: Daru Mender
text:
Morph {W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Mender is turned face up, regenerate target creature.
title: Daru Mender

name: Daru Sanctifier
text:
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Daru Sanctifier is turned face up, destroy target enchantment.
title: Daru Sanctifier

name: Daru Stinger
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each  Soldier card you reveal in your hand.)
{T}: Daru Stinger deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target attacking or blocking creature.
title: Daru Stinger

name: Deathmark Prelate
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Destroy target non-Zombie creature. It can't be regenerated. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
flavor: Death is a secret he is willing to share.
title: Deathmark Prelate

name: Defender of the Order
text:
Morph {W}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Defender of the Order is turned face up, creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.
title: Defender of the Order

name: Defiant Elf
text: Trample
flavor: "I lost one home when Yavimaya was destroyed. I will not lose another."
title: Defiant Elf

name: Deftblade Elite
text:
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
{1}{W}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Deftblade Elite this turn.
title: Deftblade Elite

name: Dermoplasm
text:
Flying
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Dermoplasm is turned face up, you may put a creature card with morph from your hand onto the battlefield face up. If you do, return Dermoplasm to its owner's hand.
title: Dermoplasm

name: Dreamborn Muse
text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top X cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard, where X is the number of cards in his or her hand.
flavor:
"Her voice is insight, piercing and true."
—Ixidor, reality sculptor
title: Dreamborn Muse

name: Drinker of Sorrow
text:
Drinker of Sorrow can't block.
Whenever Drinker of Sorrow deals combat damage, sacrifice a permanent.
flavor: It strikes at your soul, heedless of your prayers.
title: Drinker of Sorrow

name: Dripping Dead
text:
Dripping Dead can't block.
Whenever Dripping Dead deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: It oozes death from every pore.
title: Dripping Dead

name: Earthblighter
text: {2}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Destroy target land.
flavor: "A single dedicated mind can bring about the greatest destruction. That, or goblins—goblins work too."
title: Earthblighter

name: Echo Tracer
text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Echo Tracer is turned face up, return target creature to its owner's hand.
title: Echo Tracer

name: Elvish Soultiller
text: When Elvish Soultiller dies, choose a creature type. Shuffle all creature cards of that type from your graveyard into your library.
flavor: Mutated elves wondered if this was their final form, or if it was just another step.
title: Elvish Soultiller

name: Embalmed Brawler
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Whenever Embalmed Brawler attacks or blocks, you lose 1 life for each +1/+1 counter on it.
title: Embalmed Brawler

name: Enormous Baloth
flavor: Its diet consists of fruits, plants, small woodland animals, large woodland animals, woodlands, fruit groves, fruit farmers, and small cities.
title: Enormous Baloth

name: Essence Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals damage, its controller gains that much life.
flavor: The slivers would survive, even at the expense of every other creature on Otaria.
title: Essence Sliver

name: Feral Throwback
text:
Amplify 2 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
title: Feral Throwback

name: Flamewave Invoker
text: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player.
flavor: The Mirari burns in his heart.
title: Flamewave Invoker

name: Frenetic Raptor
text: Beasts can't block.
flavor:
"How do you stop a raptor from charging? No, seriously Help"
—Blarg, goblin jester
title: Frenetic Raptor

name: Fugitive Wizard
flavor: Many wizards came to the Riptide Project hoping to return home with answers. Most, however, wouldn't return home at all.
title: Fugitive Wizard

name: Gempalm Avenger
text:
Cycling {2}{W} ({2}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Avenger, Soldier creatures get +1/+1 and gain first strike until end of turn.
title: Gempalm Avenger

name: Gempalm Incinerator
text:
Cycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Incinerator, you may have it deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of Goblins on the battlefield.
title: Gempalm Incinerator

name: Gempalm Polluter
text:
Cycling {B}{B} ({B}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Polluter, you may have target player lose life equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield.
title: Gempalm Polluter

name: Gempalm Sorcerer
text:
Cycling {2}{U} ({2}{U}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Sorcerer, Wizard creatures gain flying until end of turn.
title: Gempalm Sorcerer

name: Gempalm Strider
text:
Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.
title: Gempalm Strider

name: Ghastly Remains
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
At the beginning of your upkeep, if Ghastly Remains is in your graveyard, you may pay {B}{B}{B}. If you do, return Ghastly Remains to your hand.
title: Ghastly Remains

name: Glintwing Invoker
text: {7}{U}: Glintwing Invoker gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari flares in his mind.
title: Glintwing Invoker

name: Glowering Rogon
text: Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)
flavor: A herd of one.
title: Glowering Rogon

name: Glowrider
text: Noncreature spells cost {1} more to cast.
flavor: "It is not yet time."
title: Glowrider

name: Goblin Assassin
text: Whenever Goblin Assassin or another Goblin enters the battlefield, each player flips a coin. Each player whose coin comes up tails sacrifices a creature.
flavor: The more victims he kills, the more likely he is to get the right one.
title: Goblin Assassin

name: Goblin Clearcutter
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Forest: Add three mana in any combination of {R} and/or {G} to your mana pool.
flavor:
"Did you know that wood burns even better than rocks?"
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith
title: Goblin Clearcutter

name: Goblin Dynamo
text:
{T}: Goblin Dynamo deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
{X}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Goblin Dynamo: Goblin Dynamo deals X damage to target creature or player.
title: Goblin Dynamo

name: Goblin Firebug
text: When Goblin Firebug leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land.
flavor: Most goblins leave behind a wake of destruction. A few goblins take one with them.
title: Goblin Firebug

name: Goblin Goon
text:
Goblin Goon can't attack unless you control more creatures than defending player.
Goblin Goon can't block unless you control more creatures than attacking player.
flavor: Giant-sized body. Goblin-sized brain.
title: Goblin Goon

name: Goblin Grappler
text: Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Daru soldiers learned it's better to have a clean death from a sharp blade than to tangle with a goblin's rusted chains.
title: Goblin Grappler

name: Goblin Lookout
text: {T}, Sacrifice a Goblin: Goblin creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor: "Throw rocks at 'em Throw spears at 'em Throw Furt at 'em"
title: Goblin Lookout

name: Goblin Turncoat
text: Sacrifice a Goblin: Regenerate Goblin Turncoat.
flavor:
"Goblins won't betray their own kind for any price. They'll do it for a very specific price."
—Phage the Untouchable
title: Goblin Turncoat

name: Graveborn Muse
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of Zombies you control.
flavor:
"Her voice is damnation, unyielding and certain."
—Phage the Untouchable
title: Graveborn Muse

name: Havoc Demon
text:
Flying
When Havoc Demon dies, all creatures get -5/-5 until end of turn.
flavor: A cry of pain as it enters this world. A chorus of screams as it leaves.
title: Havoc Demon

name: Hollow Specter
text:
Flying
Whenever Hollow Specter deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {X}. If you do, that player reveals X cards from his or her hand and you choose one of them. That player discards that card.
title: Hollow Specter

name: Hundroog
text: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor:
"New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis."
—Riptide Project researcher
title: Hundroog

name: Hunter Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have provoke. (When a Sliver attacks, its controller may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor: Once they get the scent, there is no escape.
title: Hunter Sliver

name: Imperial Hellkite
text:
Flying
Morph {6}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Imperial Hellkite is turned face up, you may search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
title: Imperial Hellkite

name: Infernal Caretaker
text:
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Infernal Caretaker is turned face up, return all Zombie cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.
title: Infernal Caretaker

name: Keeneye Aven
text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: "I have no need of a map. The very continent itself guides my way."
title: Keeneye Aven

name: Keeper of the Nine Gales
text:
Flying
{T}, Tap two untapped Birds you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
flavor: "You cannot fight the storm."

name: Kilnmouth Dragon
text:
Amplify 3 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it for each Dragon card you reveal in your hand.)
Flying
{T}: Kilnmouth Dragon deals damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target creature or player.

name: Krosan Cloudscraper
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}.
Morph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Krosan Cloudscraper

name: Krosan Vorine
text:
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
Krosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.
title: Krosan Vorine

name: Lavaborn Muse
text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has two or fewer cards in hand, Lavaborn Muse deals 3 damage to him or her.
flavor:
"Her voice is disaster, painful and final."
—Matoc, lavamancer
title: Lavaborn Muse

name: Liege of the Axe
text:
Vigilance
Morph {1}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Liege of the Axe is turned face up, untap it.
title: Liege of the Axe

name: Lowland Tracker
text:
First strike
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
flavor:
"I feed my hatred to the righteous and they join my crusade."
—Akroma, angelic avenger
title: Lowland Tracker

name: Macetail Hystrodon
text:
First strike, haste
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: The goblins tracked the hystrodon with much stealth and cunning. Then they were eaten with much pain and yelling.
title: Macetail Hystrodon

name: Magma Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{T}: Target Sliver creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Slivers on the battlefield."
flavor: As malleable as molten steel, but as dangerous as the finished blade.
title: Magma Sliver

name: Master of the Veil
text:
Morph {2}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Master of the Veil is turned face up, you may turn target creature with morph face down.
title: Master of the Veil

name: Merchant of Secrets
text: When Merchant of Secrets enters the battlefield, draw a card.
flavor: To scrape out a living in Aphetto, wizards are reduced to selling rumors, lies, forgeries, or—if they get desperate enough—the truth.
title: Merchant of Secrets

name: Mistform Seaswift
text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Seaswift becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Mistform Seaswift

name: Mistform Sliver
text: All Slivers have "{1}: This permanent becomes the creature type of your choice in addition to its other types until end of turn."
flavor: Taking the form of a junior researcher, the first sliver slipped out of Riptide.
title: Mistform Sliver

name: Mistform Ultimus
text: Mistform Ultimus is every creature type (even if this card isn't on the battlefield).
flavor: It may wear your face, but its mind is its own.
title: Mistform Ultimus

name: Mistform Wakecaster
text:
Flying
{1}: Mistform Wakecaster becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
{2}{U}{U}, {T}: Choose a creature type. Each creature you control becomes that type until end of turn.
title: Mistform Wakecaster

name: Nantuko Vigilante
text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Nantuko Vigilante is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment.
title: Nantuko Vigilante

name: Needleshot Gourna
text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.
title: Needleshot Gourna

name: Noxious Ghoul
text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters the battlefield, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor: Plague and death wrapped in one convenient package.
title: Noxious Ghoul

name: Patron of the Wild
text:
Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Patron of the Wild is turned face up, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
title: Patron of the Wild

name: Phage the Untouchable
text:
When Phage the Untouchable enters the battlefield, if you didn't cast it from your hand, you lose the game.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
Whenever Phage deals combat damage to a player, that player loses the game.
title: Phage the Untouchable

name: Planar Guide
text: {3}{W}, Exile Planar Guide: Exile all creatures. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to the battlefield under their owners' control.
flavor: "Every moment has its own savior."
title: Planar Guide

name: Plated Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures get +0/+1.
flavor: Overcoming extinction has only made the slivers more determined to live.
title: Plated Sliver

name: Primal Whisperer
text:
Primal Whisperer gets +2/+2 for each face-down creature on the battlefield.
Morph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Primal Whisperer

name: Primoc Escapee
text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor: Though a completely artificial species, primocs are a natural fit for the skies of Otaria.
title: Primoc Escapee

name: Quick Sliver
text:
Flash
Any player may play Sliver cards as though they had flash.
flavor: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.
title: Quick Sliver

name: Ridgetop Raptor
text: Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
flavor:
"The Skirk Ridge has many wonderful things to discover—like escape routes."
—Foothill guide
title: Ridgetop Raptor

name: Riptide Director
text: {2}{U}{U}, {T}: Draw a card for each Wizard you control.
flavor: Those who lead others to wisdom become the wisest themselves.
title: Riptide Director

name: Riptide Mangler
text: {1}{U}: Change Riptide Mangler's base power to target creature's power. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)
flavor: It wants you to be its chum.
title: Riptide Mangler

name: Rockshard Elemental
text:
Double strike (This creature deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)
Morph {4}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Rockshard Elemental

name: Root Sliver
text:
Root Sliver can't be countered.
Sliver spells can't be countered by spells or abilities.
flavor:
"It would take another apocalypse to stop the slivers now."
—Riptide Project researcher
title: Root Sliver

name: Scion of Darkness
text:
Trample
Whenever Scion of Darkness deals combat damage to a player, you may put target creature card from that player's graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
title: Scion of Darkness

name: Seedborn Muse
text: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.
flavor:
"Her voice is wilderness, savage and pure."
—Kamahl, druid acolyte
title: Seedborn Muse

name: Shaleskin Plower
text:
Morph {4}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Shaleskin Plower is turned face up, destroy target land.
title: Shaleskin Plower

name: Shifting Sliver
text: Slivers can't be blocked except by Slivers.
flavor: Once the last few slivers the Riptide Project controlled were dead, there was nothing to keep the island from being completely overrun.
title: Shifting Sliver

name: Skinthinner
text:
Morph {3}{B}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skinthinner is turned face up, destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
title: Skinthinner

name: Skirk Alarmist
text:
Haste
{T}: Turn target face-down creature you control face up. At the beginning of the next end step, sacrifice it.
flavor: "I treat each day as your last."
title: Skirk Alarmist

name: Skirk Drill Sergeant
text: Whenever Skirk Drill Sergeant or another Goblin dies, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a Goblin permanent card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.
flavor: "I order you to volunteer."
title: Skirk Drill Sergeant

name: Skirk Marauder
text:
Morph {2}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Skirk Marauder is turned face up, it deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
title: Skirk Marauder

name: Skirk Outrider
text: As long as you control a Beast, Skirk Outrider gets +2/+2 and has trample.
flavor: Once the goblins thought about it, they preferred being atop a slateback to being in front of, behind, or underneath one.
title: Skirk Outrider

name: Smokespew Invoker
text: {7}{B}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari festers in its flesh.
title: Smokespew Invoker

name: Sootfeather Flock
text:
Flying
Morph {3}{B} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
flavor: They pick at the remains of the city's corpse.
title: Sootfeather Flock

name: Spectral Sliver
text: All Sliver creatures have "{2}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn."
flavor:
"Sure, I've seen agents of the Cabal here and there. Well, not here, and certainly not in any of the sliver labs. Oh dear, I've said too much."
—Apprentice researcher
title: Spectral Sliver

name: Starlight Invoker
text: {7}{W}: You gain 5 life.
flavor: The Mirari glows in her eyes.
title: Starlight Invoker

name: Stoic Champion
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Stoic Champion gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor: His outer calm belies his inner fury.
title: Stoic Champion

name: Stonewood Invoker
text: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.
flavor: The Mirari pulses in his veins.
title: Stonewood Invoker

name: Sunstrike Legionnaire
text:
Sunstrike Legionnaire doesn't untap during your untap step.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Sunstrike Legionnaire.
{T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.
title: Sunstrike Legionnaire

name: Swooping Talon
text:
Flying
{1}: Swooping Talon loses flying until end of turn.
Provoke (When this attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.)
title: Swooping Talon

name: Synapse Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a player, its controller may draw a card.
flavor:
"Species XR17 feeds upon the mental energies of its victims. This explains why the goblins remain unaffected."
—Riptide Project researcher
title: Synapse Sliver

name: Timberwatch Elf
text: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.
title: Timberwatch Elf

name: Totem Speaker
text: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.
flavor: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."
title: Totem Speaker

name: Toxin Sliver
text: Whenever a Sliver deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor: It doesn't need to use its venom—it just needs you to know it can.
title: Toxin Sliver

name: Tribal Forcemage
text:
Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
title: Tribal Forcemage

name: Unstable Hulk
text:
Morph {3}{R}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Unstable Hulk is turned face up, it gets +6/+6 and gains trample until end of turn. You skip your next turn.
title: Unstable Hulk

name: Vexing Beetle
text:
Vexing Beetle can't be countered.
Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.
flavor: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled—but insects swarmed closer.
title: Vexing Beetle

name: Vile Deacon
text: Whenever Vile Deacon attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Clerics on the battlefield.
flavor: "The Cabal and the Order really aren't that different. After all, we are both empowered by faith."
title: Vile Deacon

name: Voidmage Apprentice
text:
Morph {2}{U}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Voidmage Apprentice is turned face up, counter target spell.
title: Voidmage Apprentice

name: Wall of Deceit
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{3}: Turn Wall of Deceit face down.
Morph {U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
title: Wall of Deceit

name: Wall of Hope
text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever Wall of Hope is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
flavor:
"What cage would you rather be inside of than out?"
—Daru riddle
title: Wall of Hope

name: Warbreak Trumpeter
text:
Morph {X}{X}{R} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Warbreak Trumpeter is turned face up, put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.
title: Warbreak Trumpeter

name: Ward Sliver
text:
As Ward Sliver enters the battlefield, choose a color.
All Slivers have protection from the chosen color.
flavor: The first wave of slivers perished from the Riptide wizards' magic. The second wave shrugged off their spells like water.
title: Ward Sliver

name: Warped Researcher
text: Whenever a player cycles a card, Warped Researcher gains flying and shroud until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor: New insights yield new senses.
title: Warped Researcher

name: Weaver of Lies
text:
Morph {4}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Weaver of Lies is turned face up, turn any number of target creatures with morph other than Weaver of Lies face down.
title: Weaver of Lies

name: Whipgrass Entangler
text: {1}{W}: Until end of turn, target creature gains "This creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {1} for each Cleric on the battlefield."
flavor: "Now that I have your attention, perhaps I can tell you of the Order."
title: Whipgrass Entangler

name: White Knight
text:
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
Protection from black (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything black.)
flavor: In the wretched depths of the Grand Coliseum, his soul shines like a single torch blazing in the night.
title: White Knight

name: Willbender
text:
Morph {1}{U} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Willbender is turned face up, change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
title: Willbender

name: Windborn Muse
text:
Flying
Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature he or she controls that's attacking you.
flavor:
"Her voice is justice, clear and relentless."
—Akroma, angelic avenger
title: Windborn Muse

name: Wingbeat Warrior
text:
Flying
Morph {2}{W} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Wingbeat Warrior is turned face up, target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
title: Wingbeat Warrior

name: Wirewood Channeler
text: {T}: Add X mana of any one color to your mana pool, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.
flavor: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."
title: Wirewood Channeler

name: Wirewood Hivemaster
text: Whenever another nontoken Elf enters the battlefield, you may put a 1/1 green Insect creature token onto the battlefield.
flavor: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."
title: Wirewood Hivemaster

name: Withered Wretch
text: {1}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor: Once it consecrated the dead. Now it desecrates them.
title: Withered Wretch

name: Zombie Brute
text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Trample
flavor: Measure its determination by the screams of its prey.
title: Zombie Brute
